thought: To craft magenta_wool, I first need to craft white_wool. To craft white_wool, I need to place 4 strings in a 2x2 square. Therefore I will move 1 string from slot 13 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
